Articles.Content:
Bug report packaged by KSP2_BugPackager


Vessel is in orbit around Moho
When I undock, the following happens:

1.  While the vessel separates into two or three sections, the game acts as if it hasn't undocked
2.  The focus is somewhere in the center of all the sections
3.  The vessel (all sections) are unresponsive to any controls
 

https://www.dropbox.com/s/xcjxk1w68cb8y86/UndockBug_logs.zip?dl=0

 

LGG
